name: Device Prediction System
desc: A machine learning model that predicts the price of second-hand electronic devices based on their specifications and condition.

name: Travel Recommendation System
desc: A travel recommendation system that suggests travel destinations based on user preferences using machine learning.

name: Movie Recommendation System
desc: A movie recommendation system that suggests movies based on user preferences using machine learning.

name: NPL Dashboard(2025)
desc: A comprehensive dashboard for the Nepal Premier League (NPL) that provides real-time statistics, player performance analysis, and match insights using data visualization techniques.
